OTHER_DOC:
National Strategic Development Plan – NSDP 2019-2013: http://www.mop.gov.kh/

National Skills Development Policy (NSDP): https://www.ilo.org/dhaka/Whatwedo/Projects/WCMS_226500/lang--en/index.htm

SDG Goal Knowledge Platform: https Cambodia Voluntary National Review 2019:

https://sustainabledevelopment.un.org/content/documents/23603Cambodia_VNR_SDPM_Approved.pdf

Ministry of Laboure and Vocational Training: http://www.mlvt.gov.kh

://sustainabledevelopment.un.org/memberstates/cambodia
COMPILING_ORG: Ministry of Planning will produce Cambodia VNR 2019, 2023, 2027, 2030 that can be found on website: http://www.mop.gov.kh/
FREQ_COLL:
The Cambodia Voluntary National Review (CVNR) will be produced during four years by four reports;

  1. CVNR 2015-2018, published on June 2019
  2. CVNR 2019-2022, published on June 2023
  3. CVNR 2023-2026, published on June 2027
  4. CVNR 2027-2030, published on June 2030
DATA_VALIDATION: Ministry of labor and Vocational Training & Ministry of Planning will validate the data
STAT_CONC_DEF: Number of trainees, students attended technical and vocational education programs by age (15 to 24 years old) "
SOURCE_TYPE:
Ministry of labor and Vocational Training will collect the data and report to Ministry of Planning every year. The report will be published as “MoLVT Annual Report” that can be found on website:

http://www.mlvt.gov.kh
SDG_TARGET: 4.3. By 2030, ensure equal access for all men and women in vocational training and higher education, including universities
SDG_INDICATOR: 4.3.2. Overall rate of study in technical and vocational education and training programs (15-24 years
SDG_GOAL: Goal 4. Ensure quality education, environment and equity and enhance lifelong learning opportunities for all people
REL_CAL_POLICY: Six months after data collection/compiling period
RATIONALE: The indicator aims to measure the percentage of trainee and student who have achieved the minimum learning outcomes in vocational education program.
QUALITY_MGMNT: The Ministry of Planning has the statistic and report department to lead the data management, data assurance and data assessment from its own ministry and the Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training
QUALITY_ASSURE: The Ministry of labor and Vocational Training have the statistic and report department to lead the data assurance and data assessment from their own ministries
INST_MANDATE: The Royal Government of Cambodia (RGC) has robust and conducive policy and regulatory frameworks to ensure affordable access and connectivity. RGC, development partners, and private sector has continued to target infrastructure, essentially roads, rail, bridges, ports, hydropower, solar farms, power transmission lines and irrigation systems. This has, to some extent, enabled garment factories to be shifted from the capital to rural areas, making it closer to labour source and relieving some burdens on urban infrastructure.
DATA_COMP: Number of trainees, students enrolled in TVET, aged 15-24 yrs devided by Population aged (15-24 yrs and multiply with 100
CONTACT_NAME:
1-Mr. Thovy Hsandy

2-Mr. CHOM Mom

3- Mr. CHOUP Vannak

4- Mr. KHEAV Solyna
COLL_METHOD: Methods collected through administrative data by Ministry of labor and Vocational Training (MoLVT). And, MoLVT will send the report to Ministry of Planning for compiling data and reporting
QUALITY_ASSMNT: The Ministry of labor and Vocational Training have the statistic and report department to lead the data assurance, reporting format, reporting monitoring and quality checking before sending the report to The Ministry of Planning.
COVERAGE: This indicator can be disaggregated by sex, occupation, age, region and others.
COMPARABILITY: The difference may arise due to: a) discrepancies in data sources; b) ISIC Revision used by a country; c) informal employment; d) coverage of data source (geographical coverage, economic activities covered, types of establishments covered, etc.); e) working-age population definition.
